name: ReactJsBoilerPlate

scripts.build: npm run clean && webpack -d && cp src/index.html dist/index.html  && mkdir dist/app/assets/css && cp src/app/assets/css/bootstrap.min.css dist/app/assets/css/bootstrap.min.css && cp src/app/assets/css/bootstrap.min.css.map dist/app/assets/css/bootstrap.min.css.map && cp src/app/assets/css/font-awesome.min.css dist/app/assets/css/font-awesome.min.css && cp src/app/assets/css/normalize.min.css dist/app/assets/css/normalize.min.css && webpack-dev-server --content-base src/ --inline --hot --port 3000 --host 0.0.0.0 --history-api-fallback
scripts.prod: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=production webpack -p && cp src/index.html dist/index.html && mkdir dist/app/assets/css && cp src/app/assets/css/bootstrap.min.css dist/app/assets/css/bootstrap.min.css && cp src/app/assets/css/bootstrap.min.css.map dist/app/assets/css/bootstrap.min.css.map && cp src/app/assets/css/font-awesome.min.css dist/app/assets/css/font-awesome.min.css && cp src/app/assets/css/normalize.min.css dist/app/assets/css/normalize.min.css

author: Neelakanteswar Patnaik
keywords: React js starter kit with bootstrap
how to use bootstrap in react js
